field.name: price_view
field.description: One of PRICE_RANGE or AS_LOW_AS

field.name: dynamic_price
field.description: Indicates whether the bundle product has a dynamic price.

field.name: dynamic_sku
field.description: Indicates whether the bundle product has a dynamic SKU.

field.name: ship_bundle_items
field.description: Indicates whether to ship bundle items together or individually.

field.name: dynamic_weight
field.description: Indicates whether the bundle product has a dynamically calculated weight.

field.name: items
field.description: An array containing information about individual bundle items.

field.name: option_id
field.description: An ID assigned to each type of item in a bundle product.

field.name: title
field.description: The display name of the item

field.name: required
field.description: Indicates whether the item must be included in the bundle.

field.name: type
field.description: The input type that the customer uses to select the item. Examples include radio button and checkbox.

field.name: position
field.description: The relative position of this item compared to the other bundle items.

field.name: sku
field.description: The SKU of the bundle product

field.name: options
field.description: An array of additional options for this bundle item

field.name: id
field.description: The ID assigned to the bundled item option

field.name: label
field.description: The text that identifies the bundled item option

field.name: qty
field.description: Indicates the quantity of this specific bundle item

field.name: position
field.description: When a bundle item contains multiple options, the relative position of this option compared to the other options

field.name: is_default
field.description: Indicates whether this option is the default option

field.name: price
field.description: The price of the selected option

field.name: price_type
field.description: One of FIXED, PERCENT, or DYNAMIC

field.name: can_change_quantity
field.description: Indicates whether the customer can change the number of items for this option

field.name: product
field.description: The ProductInterface object, which contains details about this product option
